item.title: NihongoUp
item.description: NihongoUp is a Japanese educational game & reviewing tool. ※ Learn hiragana and katakana in two weeks ※ Improve your kana IME reading speed ※ Review JLPT kanji and vocabulary in context ※ Learn to correctly use particles and counters http://nihongoup.com/
